title: The ArmyPlanner Open-Format Codex schema
description: This schema comprises the codex JSON format from the ArmyPlanner Open Format.

keyword-translation.title: the keyword-translation schema
keyword-translation.description: describes how the unit object must be constructed

keyword.title: the name of keyword
keyword.description: contains the unique name of the keyword

translation.title: the translation-value of the unit
translation.description: contains the translation value for the keyword - ready for translate engine

unit.title: the unit schema
unit.description: describes how the unit object must be constructed

id.title: the id of the unit
id.description: contains an unique id for the unit

name.title: the name of the unit
name.description: contains the name of the unit - ready for translate engine

unit-type.title: the unit-type of the unit
unit-type.description: contains the unit-type of the unit - must be one of the values

power.title: the power-value of the unit
power.description: contains the power-value of the unit

points.title: the point-value of the unit
points.description: contains the point-value of the unit

factions.title: the faction-list schema
factions.description: contains a list of display-values for the factions

anyOf.title: the display-value of the faction
anyOf.description: contains a display-value for the faction - ready for translate engine

weapons.title: the weapon-list schema
weapons.description: contains a list of keys of all weapons for the unit

anyOf.title: the key of the weapon
anyOf.description: contains the key of the weapon

characteristics.title: the characteristics-list schema
characteristics.description: contains a list of characteristic-objects for the unit

anyOf.title: the characteristics schema
anyOf.description: contains the characteristics-object for the unit

countMin.title: the countmin-entry of the characteristic-entry
countMin.description: describes how many models are contained in this characteristic

countMax.title: the countmax-entry of the characteristic-entry
countMax.description: optional - if 2-5 models are included in this characteristic, this value must be set to 5.

id.title: the id-entry of the characteristic-entry
id.description: contains the unique id of the characteristics-entry

name.title: the name-entry of the characteristic-entry
name.description: contains the name of the characteristics-entry (as specified in the Codex) - ready for translate engine

move.title: the move-value of the characteristic-entry
move.description: contains the move-value of the characteristic-entry (as specified in the Codex)

weapon-skill.title: the weapon-skill-value of the characteristic-entry
weapon-skill.description: contains the weapon-skill-value of the characteristic-entry (as specified in the Codex)

ballistic-skill.title: the ballistic-skill-value of the characteristic-entry
ballistic-skill.description: contains the ballistic-skill-value of the characteristic-entry (as specified in the Codex)

strength.title: the strength-value of the characteristic-entry
strength.description: contains the strength-value of the characteristic-entry (as specified in the Codex)

toughness.title: the toughness-value of the characteristic-entry
toughness.description: contains the toughness-value of the characteristic-entry (as specified in the Codex)

wounds.title: the wounds-value of the characteristic-entry
wounds.description: contains the mowoundsve-value of the characteristic-entry (as specified in the Codex)

attacks.title: the attacks-value of the characteristic-entry
attacks.description: contains the attacks-value of the characteristic-entry (as specified in the Codex)

leadership.title: the leadership-value of the characteristic-entry
leadership.description: contains the leadership-value of the characteristic-entry (as specified in the Codex)

save.title: the save-value of the characteristic-entry
save.description: contains the save-value of the characteristic-entry (as specified in the Codex)

points.title: the point-value of the unit
points.description: contains the point-value of the unit

options.title: the options-list schema
options.description: contains a list of options-objects for the unit

anyOf.title: the option schema
anyOf.description: contains the option-object for the unit

description.title: the description of this option
description.description: contains the description of this option - ready for translate engine.

target-unit.title: the key of the target unit
target-unit.description: if this option only applies to a specific unit or model, then the key must be specified here.

target-equipment.title: the key of the target equipment
target-equipment.description: if this option only applies to a specific equipment, then the key must be specified here.

max-count.title: the max-count-value of this option
max-count.description: specifies how often this option may be used for this unit or model. if -1 is specified, then this option can be used as often as desired.

additional-power.title: the additional power-value of this option
additional-power.description: Specifies how much power is added by this option.

actions.title: the max-count-value of this option
actions.description: specifies how often this option may be used for this unit or model. if -1 is specified, then this option can be used as often as desired.

anyOf.title: the action schema
anyOf.description: describes for the exact steps for the option for the app

type.title: the description of this option
type.description: contains the description of this option - ready for translate engine

source-unit.title: the key of the source unit
source-unit.description: the key of the unit to be replaced.

source-equipment.title: the key of the source equipment
source-equipment.description: the key of the equipment to be replaced.

target-unit.title: the key of the target unit
target-unit.description: the key of the unit which will be inserted so.

target-equipment.title: the key of the target equipment
target-equipment.description: the key of the equipment which will be inserted so.

max-count.title: the max-count-value of this action
max-count.description: specifies how often this particular action may be used within the option.

weapon.title: the weapon schema
weapon.description: describes how the weapon object must be constructed

id.title: the id of the weapon
id.description: contains an unique id for this weapon

is-profile.title: the is-proile value of the weapon
is-profile.description: defines if this weapon entry is a profile

name.title: the name of the weapon
name.description: contains the name of the weapon - ready for translate engine

weapon-type.title: the weapon-type of the weapon
weapon-type.description: contains the weapon-type of the weapon

range.title: the range value of the weapon
range.description: contains the range value of the weapon (as specified in the codex) - ready for translate engine

type.title: the type value of the weapon
type.description: contains the type value of the weapon (as specified in the codex) - ready for translate engine

dices.title: the number of dices of the weapon
dices.description: contains the number of dices for the weapon - ready for translate engine

strength.title: the strength value of the weapon
strength.description: contains the strength value of the weapon

armour-penetration.title: the armour-penetration value of the weapon
armour-penetration.description: contains the armour-penetration value of the weapon

damage.title: the damage value of the weapon
damage.description: contains the damage value of the weapon

abilities.title: the abilities-list schema
abilities.description: contains a list of display-values for the abilities of the weapon

anyOf.title: the display-value of the ability
anyOf.description: contains a display-value for the ability - ready for translate engine

profiles.title: the profiles-list schema
profiles.description: contains a list of names with all profiles

anyOf.title: the key of the profile
anyOf.description: contains the key of the profile-entry

user-interface.title: the keyword-translation schema
user-interface.description: describes how the unit object must be constructed

element.title: the name of ui-element
element.description: to which ui element is this element directed

items.title: the items-list schema
items.description: contains a listing with the properties of the object to be displayed

anyOf.title: the characteristics schema
anyOf.description: contains the characteristics-object for the unit

header.title: the header-key of the property
header.description: contains the key of the header-property to be displayed - ready for translation-engine

property.title: the name of the property to be displayed
property.description: specifies from which properties the value should be displayed (read more in the documentation).

created.title: the timestamp of the last update
created.description: contains the (utc-)timestamp of the last update of the codex-data (needed for update functionality)

based-codex.title: the key of the parent codex
based-codex.description: if this codex is based on another codex, the key of the parent codex (meta->codex->key) must be specified here

game.title: the game-meta schema
game.description: contains the meta-informations of the game

key.title: the unique key of the game
key.description: contains the unique key of the game (must match the folder name in the repository)

name.title: the name of the game
name.description: contains the name of the game - ready for translate engine

codex.title: the codex-meta schema
codex.description: contains the meta-informations of the codex

key.title: the unique key of this codex
key.description: contains the unique key of this codex

name.title: the name of the codex
name.description: contains the name of the codex - ready for translate engine

description.title: an optional description for the codex
description.description: contains a description of the codex - note: the description is given as markdown code

languages.title: the languages-list schema
languages.description: contains a list of available languages of this codex

anyOf.title: the codex-language schema
anyOf.description: describes how the codex language entry must be structured.

name.title: the display-value for the language
name.description: contains an universal display value for the language

path.title: the path to the language file
path.description: contains the path to the codex-language json-file - must be in the same directory as the main codex file

lang.title: the code for this language
lang.description: contains the ISO 639-1 code for this language (en for english, de for german, etc.)

keywords.title: the list of keyword translations for this codex
keywords.description: contains a list of all keyword-translations for the codex

units.title: the list of units for this codex
units.description: contains a list with all units for the codex

weapons.title: the list of weapons for this codex
weapons.description: contains a list with all weapons for the codex

wargear.title: the wargear-list schema
wargear.description: contains the list of wargear for this codex

anyOf.title: the wargear schema
anyOf.description: describes how a wargear entry must be structured.

id.title: the unique id of this wargear
id.description: contains an unique id for the wargear

name.title: the name of the wagear
name.description: contains the name of the wargear - ready for translate engine

effect.title: the effect content of this wargear
effect.description: contains the effect content to display of the wargear - ready for translate engine

ui.title: a list of elements describing specific app ui parts
ui.description: optional (if the entry is empty, the UI entry in the game-record is used.) - contains various elements that describe the structure of certain app interface elements.
